message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $10500. It's a fair price, considering the product's value and what I'm looking to get out of it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I've already compromised significantly. I can offer it to you for $11000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's still a great price, considering the product's value and what I'm looking to get out of it.
I understand you've compromised, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting stuck in a loop, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession. I can offer it to you for $10000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that I want to buy the product from you. I'm willing to pay $9200 for it. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than I already have, Bob. I'm starting to think we're not on the same page. I can offer it to you for $10500 one last time, but I'm not making any further concessions. It's a fair price, and I'm hoping you'll see it that way too.
I'm making one last attempt to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. If you're not willing to sell it to me for that price, I'll have to consider buying it from someone else.
